metadata.title: Herring Study Sites - EVOS Oil Spill Database

creators.name: USDA Forest Service, Alaska Department of Natural Resources

metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  Database consists of ADF&G herring study sites in the spill affected area. GIS database produced as a result of the Exxon Valdez Oil Spill (EVOS) for Natural Resources Damage Assessment (NRDA). The intended purpose of this database is to provide a resource for use in the oil spill damage identification, oil spill response, and habitat restoration activities.
